org.jetel.data

Class DataRecordMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.DataRecordMap

  • public class DataRecordMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Specialized hash map implementation for storing DataRecords with the single RecordKey. It enables to store more values with the same key. Duplicate values are stored as linked list. T also enables to change functionality of put operation. (if map contains value with specified key, new value is not saved at all).

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the table
      DataRecordMap.DataRecordLookup createDataRecordLookup(RecordKey key, DataRecord record)
      Creates lookup object which is optimized for repeated call of get() method under the same RecordKey and DataRecord object.
      DataRecord get(RecordKey key, DataRecord record)
      Retrieves DataRecord which is stored under key specified by given RecordKey and DataRecord If duplicates flag is turned on, this method returns only the first data record associated with the key IMPORTANT: Use DataRecordLookup object if record key and data record Object do not change

        duplicate - If set to true, more values can be stored under one key

        key - The general key for put operation.
        duplicate - If set to true, more values can be stored under one key
        initialCapacity - the initial capacity

      • DataRecordMap

        public DataRecordMap(RecordKey key,
             boolean duplicate,
             boolean overwrite)
        Constructs DataRecordMap object with initial capacity of DEFAULT_INITIAL_CAPACITY (16).
        Parameters:
        key - The general key for put operation.
        duplicate - If set to true, more values can be stored under one key
        overwrite - Flag which changes behaviour of put operation True (default) - existing value is overwritten by the new one False - existing value remains, new is scrapped

      • DataRecordMap

        public DataRecordMap(RecordKey key,
             boolean duplicate,
             int initialCapacity,
             boolean overwrite)
        /** Constructs DataRecordMap object with the specified initial capacity
        Parameters:
        key - The general key for put operation.
        duplicate - If set to true, more values can be stored under one key
        initialCapacity - the initial capacity
        overwrite - Flag which changes behaviour of put operation True (default) - existing value is overwritten by the new one False - existing value remains, new is scrapped

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(DataRecord record)
        Insert the record into hash map. Key is generated according to key fields indexes specified by RecordKey object Record is scrapped if overwrite flag is turned off.
        Parameters:
        record - record to be inserted

      • get

        public DataRecord get(RecordKey key,
             DataRecord record)
        Retrieves DataRecord which is stored under key specified by given RecordKey and DataRecord If duplicates flag is turned on, this method returns only the first data record associated with the key IMPORTANT: Use DataRecordLookup object if record key and data record Object do not change
        Parameters:
        key - object which sets which part of record is key
        record - record from which is generated key
        Returns:
        data record stored under specified key.

      • getAll

        public DataRecordMap.DataRecordIterator getAll(RecordKey key,
                                      DataRecord record)
        Retrieves all data records which are stored under key specified by given RecordKey and DataRecord. Multiple values are stored as linked list so iterator is returned. get() method should be called if duplicates flag is turned off
        Parameters:
        key - object which sets which part of record is key
        record - record from which is generated key
        Returns:
        Data record iterator stored under specified key.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(DataRecord record)
        Removes all records associated with key generated with the use of put key.
        Parameters:
        record - data record from which key will be generated
        Returns:

      • remove

        public boolean remove(RecordKey recordKey,
             DataRecord dataRecord)
        Removes all records associated with key generated with the use of specified key.
        Parameters:
        recordKey - record key which specifies which columns of data record will be sued as key
        dataRecord - data record from which key will be generated
        Returns:

        public java.util.Iterator<DataRecord> getOrphanedIterator()
